narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Renaissance Community Homes is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility  Mental Illness provider based in Adrian, MI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $85.0M in Medicaid payments across 195K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $85.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
